name: Peter the Pestdoctor
description:
Made at the alpha gamejam 2016 hosted by Hochschule Mittweida

The world has gone to hell,

 the apocalypse is here, but that only opens new venues to get money!

 Collect blood of the infected to upgrade your wagon and get even more next round! 

Be careful about chasms and stones though, your carriage really isn't a fan of those!

Controls:

A&D to rotate your wagon

shift to accelerate

spacebar to jump

Note: you have to select one part of every kind to start a new round!
